title: Saladin
subtle:
Biography (nonfiction), 1,487 words, Level X (Grade 5), Lexile 1030L            
                        
		Multilevel Book also available in levels                     T and Z2
description: During the Crusades, one leader united the Muslim people and retook the city of Jerusalem. Find out how he accomplished this as well as much more in this exciting biography of Saladin.
highFrequencyWords: Use of vocabulary lessons requires a subscription to VocabularyA-Z.com.
